title: Grimy toadflax

properties.name: description
properties.value: A grimy toadflax is a herb that has not yet been cleaned to make a toadflax. Grimy toadflaxes are grown from a toadflax seed with a Farming level of 38. Each herb grants 38.5 Farming experience when harvested. This is a great way to make a profit through farming, as toadflax seeds are inexpensive. Cleaning a grimy toadflax requires a Herblore level of 30 and gives 8 Herblore experience. Clean toadflaxes are used to make agility potions, antidote+, and saradomin brews with Herblore levels of 34, 68, and 81, respectively.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Grimy toadflax
This article is about the grimy herb. For the cleaned herb, see Toadflax.
 This article has money making guides: Cleaning grimy toadflax, Farming toadflax.
Please add tips to the subpages, rather than the article below.
Grimy toadflax

Item ID3049

A grimy toadflax is a herb that has not yet been cleaned to make a toadflax. Grimy toadflaxes are grown from a toadflax seed with a Farming level of 38. Each herb grants 38.5 Farming experience when harvested. This is a great way to make a profit through farming, as toadflax seeds are inexpensive. Cleaning a grimy toadflax requires a Herblore level of 30 and gives 8 Herblore experience. Clean toadflaxes are used to make agility potions, antidote+, and saradomin brews with Herblore levels of 34, 68, and 81, respectively.

Grimy toadflax is one of the five herbs that cannot be obtained from the Sorceress's Garden minigame. They can, however, be purchased with Agility arena tickets at the Brimhaven Agility Arena or with points at the Pest Control minigame. They can also be earned from Temple Trekking.

One of the few monsters that drops toadflax is the Tree spirit.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
12 August 2020
(update)

Composting grimy toadflax will now yield supercompost instead of regular compost.

9 March 2017
(update)

The item's value was increased from 1 to 19.

26 February 2015
(update)
  • The item was graphically updated to distinguish it from other grimy herbs.
  • The item was renamed from "Herb" to "Grimy toadflax".
  • The item was made tradeable on the Trading Post/Grand Exchange.
  • The "Identify" option was changed to a "Clean" option.
25 February 2013
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Grimy toadflax" to "Herb".
  • The "Clean" option was changed to an "Identity" option.
22 February 2013
(update)
  • The item was renamed from "Herb" to "Grimy toadflax".
  • The "Identify" option was changed to a "Clean" option.
11 July 2005
(update)

The item was made obtainable.

27 July 2004
(update)

The item was added to the game cache.

This is a great way to make a profit through farming, as toadflax seeds are inexpensive. Cleaning a grimy toadflax requires a [[Herblore]] level of 30 and gives 8 Herblore experience. Clean toadflaxes are used to make [[agility potion]]s, [[antidote+]], and [[saradomin brew]]s with Herblore levels of 34, 68, and 81, respectively. Grimy toadflax is one of the five herbs that cannot be obtained from the [[Sorceress's Garden]] [[minigame]]. They can, however, be purchased with [[Agility arena ticket]]s at the [[Brimhaven Agility Arena]] or with points at the [[Pest Control]] [[minigame]].
